name: Squeeze-Compressed LBR File
summary: An LQR file is an .LBR archive that has been compressed using Squeeze (SQ) compression . It contains a collection of files, such as those that comprise a software program, that have been packaged together for easier distribution. To retrieve the files an LQR file contains, users need both a Squeeze decompression utility and a LU expansion utility.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
